metadata.title: CVE-2017-12869 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The multiauth module in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.13 and earlier allows remoteattackers to bypass authentication context restrictions and use anauthentication source defined in config/authsources.php via vectors relatedto improper validation of user input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12869` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.14.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
